TopicTitle: Mods that will make the game realistic for 0.25

Articles.Content:
I've searched the forums for a reality post but couldn't find one. So I have a quick question.

So far for 0.25 I have alot of mods, but three of them that are really needed for realism aren't supported by 0.25. Which are Deadly Re-Entry, Ferram Aerospace Research, and MechJeb.

But I'm confused because MechJeb said it is capable with 0.25.

Does anyone have any suggestions for mods or how to fix that?

Update to the latest version.

0.25 might not be 'dead' yet but it will be very soon.

Aw man, don't even get me started on 'realistic' ^^. This is a computer simulation - don't try to go there.

Real life is hard, that's why I play games....

But if you want a some what historic play-through try Real Solar System and some of the other replica mods such as mine.
You could always just download the old version of your favourite mods. CKAN probably has the capability to download them for you.

Moved to Addon General.

Realism Overhaul is the goto mod for realism. Using the CKAN, you can get the .25 versions of all the mods for it, too, if you want to stay on .25 (indeed RP-0, the career mod for Realism Overhaul, has not updated to .90).
